document_data.name: Melegor Chaserperi
document_data.mainbody: '''Melegor Chaserperi''' was a member of the [[Chaserperi]] clan of [[mage]]s of the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: He was said to have leveraged the secret of an entrance into [[Candlekeep]] into a deal where the [[Chaserperi]] clan performed many tasks in the great library, thus gaining a place in the fortress. However, as per Melegor, there were other hidden passages of which he had never spoken.
